meaningMnemonic: This word consists of kanji with hiragana attached. Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>attach</kanji> so the verb version is <vocabulary>to attach something</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading is actually the same as the one you learned with the kanji, meaning you should be able to read this one just fine.
